description:
Sets minimum player count to `$minplayers`.
If player count is lower than `$minplayers`, adds bots.
Also sets `minplayers_per_team` to 2.

Sets bot difficulty to 101, thus enabling superbots.
_Be warned that these bots are a real challenge to even the best veteran players._
 - Xonotic 0.8.6 Patch Notes

Extends match time by 5 minutes.
Goes up to 55 minutes.

Reduces match time by 5 minutes.
Goes down to 5 minutes.
Ends current match and changes map to `$mapname`.
Restarts current match and enables the Instagib mutator for current map/mode.
Restarts current match and disables the Instagib mutator for current map/mode.

Kicks a player from the server.
You can use their username or player #.
Use `status 2` to get a player's #.
Shuffles teams in team-based game modes like TDM and CTF.
